description: The Balearic Islands ban pub crawls and happy hours in popular destinations in Ibiza and Majorca.
title: Spain's Magaluf and Ibiza crack down on alcohol-fuelled holidays
title_page: Spain's Magaluf and Ibiza crack down on alcohol-fuelled holidays - BBC News
maintext: The new regulations have also outlawed "balconing", where people jump from hotel balconies, often into swimming pools. The practice has been linked to a number of tourist deaths and injuries. Authorities said those caught taking part in the activity would now be forced to leave their hotel and could face fines.
